phrases: jou jou yuu jou ban jin ma ji kai chou
ki mi wa best best friend
(furai!) cho tto fu za ke te mi ta ra
(faito!) ke n ka shi cha tta to ki mo
sa su ga sai kou friend
wa ke wa ka nnai nai
jou jou yuu jou ban jin ma ji kai chou
cha cha la cha la cha cha
You are my best, best friend!
When I joke around a bit,
You joke around more in response.
Being together 24 hours a day is not a problem.
Just like twins, or a parent and child, or clone cyborgs.
Then is not there no reason to clear your eyes?
Those are completely, completely different issues.
Even when I get in a fight with you,
(Down!) even when I get really down,
(Shy!) even when I feel like I want to be alone,
before I realise it, you are right there; we will be together even in death!
I want to be with you.
It is fun, is not it?
As expected of my best friend!
And then yo de le hi hoo!
I do not get it at all!
It is better than I imagined, the absolute best!
Even if I say this and that, we are still friends.
Cha Cha La Cha La Cha Cha!
I respect and owe a great deal to my teachers
Many years have passed in this garden of learning
These months and years have gone by quickly
Now is the time to part, farewell
Everything in this world can be proven by science.
In the world there are talks about the so-called spiritual phenomena...
There is no way those kinds of sleep-inducing things could be real!
It would be bad if they were.
I do not believe in spirits!
I heard that exorcisms were being performed at a local temple, so I went to check it out.
First, I will pretend I am possessed by a demon,
then I will look for contradictions.
Lately, I have been having the feeling of something tightening around my throat.
The offering of useless exorcism goods!
It should work really well on your throat.
Is there not enough reality in my story?
Well, then I will need to get him to believe me.
it is not just that my throat is sore...
It feels like I am being strangled by someone,
and I think I heard a strange voice.
I never would have thought that someone in the business would tell me that.
More importantly, does this priest even believe in spirits?
But I came all this way to the temple.
There is no way I am just going to back down!
I am being strangled by some sort of monster!
I was wrong for trying to fool someone in the business with a half-assed performance!
I have to do it seriously.
What the heck are you doing?!
What the heck are you doing?!
What in the world is this?!
What are you doing to my temple?!
My dream is to become a scientist.
I seem to have lost myself.
To explain everything in this world with science...
And when that time comes, there is one thing I want to express.
A person can become a demon at any time.
Mihoshi, it is been a while.
I have not seen you for a while.
You are already a middle schooler, huh?
Well, lately, you have not been coming to the dojo at all.
I have not gone to practise at my university lately, either.
And yet you still won the National Tournament?
Are you going to the dojo now?
Clubs just ended, so I am going now.
I am the type that gets weaker when I practise a lot.
Although I can accept that she is strong,
I cannot accept that she is strong despite never practising.
It is been rumoured that when Naganohara-san was in middle school, she scored a point against the Master!
I am a middle schooler now, too, but I cannot seem to do anything.
I go to the dojo after club,
and I spend my entire weekend practising.
The Master says that effort will always open up a door!
When I look at her, I start to feel uneasy.
In this situation, even I can...
This is the most I can do right now,
but someday I will do it in a match.
I will do it against the Master someday, too!
Be sure to do it right.
Dad intends to pass the business on to me.
If a kid comes around, hand it to him.
I will not stand for this.
As soon as I see a chance, I am running for it!
In the very end, I just want a little bit of a happy ending.
What are you going to ask Santa for, Professor?
Having that many is not fair!
Well, what I would like is...
Two packs of eggs, 500 grams of beef, a book and...
I have already asked for a lot, so you only get one thing, Nano!
Nano, if it is only a little more, then I guess it is okay.
I will let you borrow this, too.
I am not sticking around for this!
I need to hurry up and get this off!
Are you going to run away, Tsuyoshi?
I made some modifications to the mask.
Damn, I dropped my meat bun!
I did not even get to take a bite out of it...
If there had been poison in that meat bun, you would have died,
so it is actually a good thing!
It is what I look forward to the most on the way home from school...
You need to always look forward.
Be thankful to the fallen meat bun.
What is with your extremely positive attitude?
I have decided to always be positive, even in tough times!
Look, if you take off the dirty parts, you can still eat it.
Good things happen when you are positive.
My meat bun is not safe, though...
It is times like this you need to be positive!
If there had been poison in the meat bun,
You do not have much variation.
Even if I remove the parts that got dirty,
I cannot accept the fact that some popsicle juice got on it.
The heat from the meat bun must have made it a bit loose.
If I imagine that there was poison in the popsicle, I can handle this...
You were eating so much of it, though.
Your positiveness just had its combo broken!
No, this is a message from God that I should not eat two because I might get a stomach ache!
Also, if this had been soft serve, it would be completely out.
I can just wash off this popsicle.
You are still going to eat that?
It is like it is wet.
If you refuse to inherit my legacy,
just wait for my second and third traps!
Tachibana, what are you going to do in the future?
I am deciding between going to a university or getting into cooking.
Oh, Nano, I am going to take Sakamoto out for a walk.
I am going to have some friends over to study, is that all right?
I want to play, too, so I will be right back.
I am the one that wants to cry here!
They are dogs, so they might bite.
T-They are on leads, so there is no way we will get bitten.
Our only choice is to run!
If you give up, it is over!
Ask the owner to hurry up and put their leads on!
I found a gummy in my pocket.
While they are busy eating it, we will make our escape!
Make a tool to help us escape.
I do not have any tools to make a tool!
Fine then, just do whatever you want!
TL Note: This is a common Japanese phrase: Boil me or burn me or do whatever you want to me.
We are going to be eaten.
We are going to be eaten.
If we are going to be eaten, we might be eaten.
Oh, this is the Professor you were talking about.
Go take care of the dogs!
He is a lot softer than I expected!
Hurry up and fend the dogs off!
You want revenge because they bit you!
No, they are about to bite us!
Let me guess: you are scared of dogs?
TL Note: Oba-Q, from the manga Obake no Q-tarou, is deathly afraid of dogs.
It is a dog, so it is going to bite!
There is no way he will bite.
It will not bite if you do not get near it, so do not worry.
All right, let us get Yukko up and go to Nano-chan's house.
You have to keep them on a lead!
There were dogs, and we got chocolate.
You are still just a kid.
More importantly, take this rope off of me.
All right, since I got chocolate.
It would be off already if I could!
Let us get Yukko to take it off.
Wow, you are sweating a lot!
That being said, Aioi-san and Naganohara-san sure are late.
I am sure they came in this direction...
People live by helping each other out, Takashi.
The same is true about animals' hearts, Takashi.
Do not take the bond between an animal and a human lightly, Takashi.
Humans, do you prefer it with the taste of melon or without?
Continue the debate over this for eternity.
